entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Huntingdon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 04:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow this morning and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
